title: Load in bug
body:
game will often show all players at 0% for an extended period instead of normal loading
Has resulted in joining games late

replies.body: It sounds like your client is having a hard time making that initial connection to the game server you're going to be playing on. Let's check out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick to see if there's something you could update to make that happen smoother, but let me know if that doesn't seem to help much.
I ran the repair tool but it hasn't helped. Every game I start at 0% and now i can't even load in half the time. Its resulted in a leaverbuster now.
Best advice I can give, alt f4 if you see this and reconnect, or try the repair tool from riot
